title: update failed unspecified error occured
body: please help I have this problem since last night...

replies.body:
Issues in patching can be caused by a number of potential factors. Problems with League's system permissions and a poor connection to the servers are the most common causes. Our [Patching Issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) goes over the most frequent fixes, so I recommend starting there. 

Let me know if you continue to run into issues after working through those steps.
How did you solve this? I'm getting it too

[Follow my post.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/c4d3JMHh-update-failed-unspecified-error-occured?comment=0001)

This is usually due to your permissions not being set up to allow League to run.

[Grant League permission to run on your computer!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Annie_3.jpg
